## Biography

Adam Struzik is a mathematics Master's degree student at Adam
Mickiewicz University (Poznań, Poland), specialising in statistics and
data analysis. His interests focus on machine learning and spatial data
analysis.

He is employed as a Senior Statistician at the Centre for Urban
Statistics of the Statistical Office in Poznań.

## Education

-   2025–current: Adam Mickiewicz University, Poznań, Poland: Master's degree student (mathematics, specialisation: statistics and data analysis)  
-   2022–2025: Adam Mickiewicz University, Poznań, Poland: Bachelor's degree student (mathematics, specialisation: statistics and data analysis)
